nodes.text: Shawda Clubb sandwich was a type of sandwich served at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant. It consisted of slices of Manpha-fowl meat, nuna bacon, Revwien lettuce, and topatos on toasted or therm-zapped pseudograin bread and cost 6.7 credits.
Other than the similarity in name, no connection has been made between the Shawda Clubb sandwich and the Shawda Ubb.
